items.title: Warren Buffett’s longtime Social Security warning is coming to fruition, with retirees facing an $18,000 annual cut
items.description: The Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget projects that Social Security's main trust fund will be insolvent by the end of 2032, triggering automa...

items.title: A federal judge just dealt a blow to RFK Jr.’s strategy to defund Planned Parenthood
items.description: Planned Parenthood must keep getting Medicaid funds from the government as it fights attempts to cut off money for its health clinics.

items.title: A Delta pilot was arrested on child sex abuse material charges after landing in San Francisco
items.description: Federal agents entered the cockpit once the plane landed and took him into custody.

items.title: Trump and JD Vance are on completely different continents right now and they’re still getting peppered with Epstein questions
items.description: Asked about the timing of the US-EU trade announcement and the Epstein case, Trump responded: “You got to be kidding with that."

items.title: Ryan Reynolds’ Maximum Effort ad agency turned Astronomer’s viral moment into marketing gold
items.description: The Oscar winner surprised everyone by speaking on behalf of the company following CEO scandal.
